comments:
eclipse.buildId=I20060428-1315
java.version=1.5.0_07
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86

1.5 RC5 with Eclipse 3.2 RC7

I get the following exception when I try to enter some text in the documentation tab of the tabbed properties page for any attribute of a defined attribute group.


Example:

	<xsd:attributeGroup name="descriptiveAttributes">
		<xsd:annotation>
			<xsd:documentation>A group of attributes that describe an element.</xsd:documentation>
		</xsd:annotation>
		<xsd:attribute
			name="label"
			type="xsd:string" />
		<xsd:attribute
			name="tooltip"
			type="xsd:string" />
		<xsd:attribute
			name="tooltipWidgetId"
			type="xsd:string" />


Then, navigate to the attribute group and select any attribute (eg. "label"). Right click and select show properties. The documentation tab gets visible. Try to enter some text.


Error
Tue Jun 27 20:22:44 EDT 2006
java.lang.NullPointerException
